_header: Be the churl never so hard
_description: A tag in William Wey’s Latin Itinerary to Compostella — three monorhyming lines

Bod565.Transcription:
Be the chorel nevyr so hardHe shall qwake by þe berdear he
                    passe lyzarde
Bod565.Editions:
Williams,  G.,
                        ed.  
             The Itineraries of William Wey, Fellow of Eton College, to Jerusalem,
                AD 1458 and AD 1462; and To Saint James of Compostella, AD 1456.
             2 vols. 
             Roxburghe Club
         76, 88. London, 1857, 1867: 2.155.
